# id

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies an offer that applies to the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
let id: String?
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/Offer-swift.struct/id] is the offer identifier that you provide when you set up an offer in App Store Connect.

This value is `nil` if the offer is an [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/OfferType-swift.struct/introductory] offer for an auto-renewable subscription.

If the offer type is [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/OfferType-swift.struct/code], the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/Offer-swift.struct/id] value contains the reference name of the offer code you set up in App Store Connect.  For more information, see [https://help.apple.com/app-store-connect/#/dev6a098e4b1].

## Getting offer details

- **type**: The type of offer that applies to the transaction.
- **Transaction.OfferType**: The types of offers that apply to a transaction.
- **paymentMode**: The payment mode for a subscription offer on an auto-renewable subscription that applies to the transaction.
- **Transaction.Offer.PaymentMode**: The payment modes for offers that apply to a transaction.
- **period**: The duration of the offer applied to a transaction.
